name: Sparkfly
description:
What happened to the Land of Sparkflies? Where is everybody? Why have the buildings disappeared? How come the sparkflies are acting so strange?

Well, you're not gonna find out today because I had only one week to make this game.

Sparkfly is my entry in the GDevelop Game Jam #1.

Enjoy!

Credits:
Music, coding, level design and concept by Doctor Musik
Visual assets by CraftPix.net
